name: The Pandemic Digital Dating Game
description:
It's November 2020, and you've been social distancing for the past 7 months. Unfortunately, you were not one of the lucky ones who U-Hauled and adopted a cat with that girl you met at Cubbyhole right before the pandemic panic. Instead, since March you have been stuck in a perpetual cycle of talking to random strangers on dating apps until the conversation eventually gets boring or you find out she has long acrylic nails and you move onto the next one.

Except today you've decided enough is enough, it's time to find your soulmate. Choose your way through potential matches in The Pandemic Digital Dating Game. Will you get lucky and find the one, or will you fall deeper into the cycle of perpetual swiping and liking?
